hero.title: Your health, our priority
hero.subtitle: MIMAP supports you in preventive medicine, family health, occupational health and first aid and CPR training.

who_we_are.title: Who are we?
who_we_are.content: MIMAP is a group of general practitioners and specialists dedicated to preventive medicine, occupational health and certified training in first aid and CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation).

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.content: Our mission is to place individual well-being at the heart of all our actions. Specialists devoted to the health and serenity of the whole family, regardless of age.

our_team.title: Our Team
our_team.content: A team of experienced healthcare professionals, united by the passion to heal and prevent. We combine medical expertise and human approach to offer you the best care.

our_values.title: Our Values
our_values.content: Excellence, benevolence, innovation and proximity guide our daily practice. We believe in accessible, preventive and patient-centered medicine.

our_vision.title: Our Vision
our_vision.content: To be your trusted health partner, offering innovative and personalized medical solutions to improve your quality of life.
